block.p: CREATIVE HOST SERVICES INC., San Diego, a provider of in-flight catering and food, news and other airport concessions, said it planned to buy closely held GladCo Enterprises, gaining 20 food concessions at Pittsburgh International Airport and three other airports in the eastern United States.

CREATIVE HOST SERVICES INC., San Diego, a provider of in-flight catering and food, news and other airport concessions, said it planned to buy closely held GladCo Enterprises, gaining 20 food concessions at Pittsburgh International Airport and three other airports in the eastern United States.
LG&E ENERGY CORP., Louisville, which owns the two biggest utilities in Kentucky, said it planned to build as many as 10 natural-gas-fired turbines in Kentucky and Georgia.
